categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Arzanon was a male Human Sith Inquisitor of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. He was the head of security at the Sith Academy, and worked with an Intelligence officer to search for traitor acolytes who wanted to throw down the Emperor's Order. He was a fanatic loyalist to the Sith Emperor, constantly mentioning him. In 3637 BBY, Arzanon was killed when a Republic strike team landed on Korriban.
Arzanon is introduced in the mission "Allegiance" for Sith classes in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic.
